gt;4 and `r.RANK` <=8 then “Cabin” else “Other”| |level|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION q`, `XCREW.RANK r`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL caq`, `XCREW.RANK r`|**Qualifications:** `q.RANK`, `r.RANK`, `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT`
**Additional Qualifications:** `caq.RANK`, `r.RANK`, `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT`|**Qualifications:** when `q.RANK` = `r.RANK` then `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT`
**Additional Qualifications:** when `caq.RANK` = `r.RANK` then `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT`| |startDate|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL`|**Qualifications:** `valid_since_dt`
**Additional Qualifications:** `valid_since`| | |endDate|**Qualifications:** `XCREW.QUALIFICATION`
**Additional Qualifications:** `XCREW.CRM_ADD_QUAL`|**Qualifications:** `valid_until_dt`
**Additional Qualifications:** `valid_until`| | # Crew Documents Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * All data #### - Source Query **Documents:** `Riverx_CrewDocument_Query` **Licence:** `Riverx_CrewDocument_License_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps * Every day at 03:00 (UTC) #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key combining `crewId` and `docNo` fields * Delete operation can not be performed because of the lack of status in the source system data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |crewId|**Documents:** `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT`
**Licence:** `xcrew.LICENCE`|`TLC`| | |type|**Documents:** `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT`|**Documents:** `TYPE_OF_DOCUMENT`|**Documents:**
  • when `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT.TYPE_OF_DOCUMENT` = “P“
    then“Passport“
  • when `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT.TYPE_OF_DOCUMENT` = “A“
    then “Alien Resident Number“
  • when `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT.TYPE_OF_DOCUMENT` = “I“
    then “Identity Card“
  • when `
